metadata.description:
199 pages!
What would you do if you never had to sleep again? When billionaire Grant Auden develops a new medical procedure that eliminates the need for sleep, the world's most powerful protectors, The Idealists, undergo the procedure in order to show mankind the benefits of staying forever awake. But as the heroes work tirelessly, reporter Emma Troy discovers an unexpected and alarming side effect - without sleep, there are no dreams.
metadata.name: Every Waking Moment
